title: Display quiz score inline with article title in X/6 format with theme-colored medal icon

requirements.summary: Move quiz score display from 'Take Quiz' button to inline position next to article/category title with X/6 format and theme-colored medal icon
acceptanceCriteria: The quiz score no longer appears as a number badge/overlay on top of the 'Take Quiz' button.
The score appears inline on the same visual row as the article/category title and the 'Take Quiz' button.
The score is positioned close to and to the right of the title text.
A medal or award icon is displayed immediately next to the 'X/6' score text.
The medal/award icon uses the app's primary theme color (CSS theme variable, not a hardcoded color).
If no quiz score has been recorded for a category, the score and icon are not shown.
Layout does not break on mobile screen sizes.

file_operations.description: Remove the existing quiz score badge/overlay from the 'Take Quiz' button. Add a new inline score display component positioned immediately to the right of the article/category title text in the same row. Format the score as 'X/6' (e.g., '3/6') and display a medal/award icon (using lucide-react's Award or Medal icon) next to it. Apply the theme's primary color to the icon using CSS custom properties (e.g., 'hsl(var(--primary))'). Conditionally render this score display only when `categoryScores[currentCategory]` exists. Ensure the layout remains responsive on mobile by using appropriate Tailwind flex utilities (flex-row, items-center, gap) and text sizing.
